summary:
The search results provide a range of resources discussing future predictions of artificial intelligence (AI). Wikipedia offers an overview of the concept, highlighting its various aspects and applications. An educational resource delves deeper into the fundamentals, history, and modern applications of AI predictions. Additionally, news articles report on recent developments in the field, suggesting promising advancements in the future. 

A research paper offers a comprehensive analysis of future predictions of AI from multiple perspectives, showcasing extensive studies conducted by the authors. Lastly, a forum allows users to engage in discussions about AI predictions, where individuals share experiences, insights, and questions related to various aspects of the topic. Overall, these resources collectively provide a well-rounded view of the future predictions of artificial intelligence, covering its breadth of applications, recent developments, and ongoing discussions within the field.
